entities.name: lord voldemort
entities.description: Lord Voldemort is mentioned as a person who will become a powerful wizard. He is described as having 'beginnings' which implies that he has a history or past.

entities.name: tom riddle
entities.description: Tom Riddle is mentioned as a handsome Muggle who abandoned his witch wife, Merope. He is described as having returned to his family home in Little Hangleton.

entities.name: merope
entities.description: Merope is mentioned as a witch who was abandoned by her husband, Tom Riddle. She is described as being left alone in London, expecting the baby who would become Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: caractacus burke
entities.description: Caractacus Burke is mentioned as a person who helped found the shop whence came the necklace they have been discussing. He is described as providing evidence that Merope was in London.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as a person who knows about Merope's location and provides evidence from Caractacus Burke to support his claim.

relationships.description: Tom Riddle abandoned his witch wife, Merope. This is described as a past event that has significance for the story of Lord Voldemort's beginnings.

Dumbledore provided evidence from Caractacus Burke to support his claim that Merope was in London. This is described as a present-day event where Dumbledore uses historical information to inform the story.
